newsitem.title: JAPAN: CSK Corp says to repurchase up to 360,000 shares.
newsitem.headline: CSK Corp says to repurchase up to 360,000 shares.

text.p: CSK Corp said on Thursday it would buy back up to 360,000 of its shares, at an cost not exceeding 1.8 billion yen.

The information services company said in a statement that the repurchase would be conducted in order to introduce a stock-option scheme. The scheme must be approved by a shareholders' meeting scheduled for June 27.
CSK added that it was also planning to alter company regulations to enable it to buy back, subject to approval by the board of directors, up to 6.4133 million of its shares.
The regulation change must also be approved at the shareholders' meeting.
